data.meta_description: Is the climate in Schwarzwald (in Germany) in april good? Discover the weather forecast in april 2025 to prepare your trip.

Best time to go to Schwarzwald (Black Forest)?

Weather in Schwarzwald in april 2025

The weather in Schwarzwald (Black Forest) in april comes from statistical datas on the last years. You can view the weather statistics for the whole month, but also by using the tabs for the beginning, the middle and the end of the month.

Evolution of daily average temperature and precipitation in Schwarzwald in april

These charts show the evolution of average minimum/maximum temperatures as well as average daily precipitation volume in Schwarzwald in april.

The climate of Schwarzwald (Black Forest) in april is tolerable

In april in Schwarzwald (Black Forest), the climate is wet (with 76mm of rainfall over 5 days). This is better than the previous month since in march it receives an average of 81mm of rainfall over 6 days.

The climate is quite cool in that area the month of april, but it is liveable when dressing cosy. The thermometer averaged maximum of 17°C. The minimum is 8°C. Thus, the mean temperature average on this month of april in Schwarzwald (Black Forest) is 12°C. Note that seasonal normals in contrast with those observed in Schwarzwald (Black Forest) in april with a maximum record of 29°C in 2012 and a minimum record of -4°C in 2013. You can plan to have about 12 days with temperatures up to 18°C, or 40% of the month.

Day length in Schwarzwald (Black Forest) in april is 13:40. The sun rises at 05:38 and sets at 19:18.

With proper weather, april is okay (but not the best) to go in this city in Germany.

Schwarzwald (Black Forest): another month?

If you can push back the dates of your trip, we advise you to go in may to Schwarzwald (Black Forest). more information

Weather data for Schwarzwald (Black Forest) in april:

Weather data for Schwarzwald (Black Forest) for april are derived from an average of the weather forecast since 2009 in Schwarzwald. There is a margin of error and these forecasts are to be considered as general information only. The weather in Schwarzwald can vary slightly from year to year, but this data should limit surprises. So you can pack your bags or check for the best time in year to go to Schwarzwald (Black Forest).
